title: Announcement: Crack in the Road / Disco Naivete / Unrecorded Presents: Dark Paradise @ CMJ
body:
**UPDATE: Unfortunately Holychild have had to pull out of our showcase due to unforeseen circumstances, however we’re very excited to announce that the brilliant Saint Pepsi are now joining our bill.**

** You can find out more information about Saint Pepsi, and the rest of our showcase, below!**

We are very proud, and unbelievably excited, to announce that we’re joining forces with our good friends [**Disco Naivete**](http://disconaivete.com/) and [**Unrecorded**](http://www.listenbeforeyoubuy.net/) to present an official CMJ showcase at this year’s [**CMJ Festival**](cmj.com).

After the resounding success of our SXSW party back in March, we couldn’t resist the opportunity to further our ‘Dark Paradise’ live incarnation, and on this occasion we have Unrecorded on our side to provide a strong grounding in the US. Unrecorded is the new face of **Listen Before You Buy**, and CMJ will see their official unveiling in their new blog attire. As to facilitate this change, LBYB have a fund raising objective in place, and you can read more about it [here](http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-listen-before-you-buy-become-unrecorded).

We’re going to be basing ourselves in the legendary **Pianos Bar**, a venue known across New York for it’s presentation of fresh and exciting music, and a stalwart in the CMJ venue shortlist. This event will be free entry to CMJ badge holders, and $10 on the door to general public.

What’s more, we have the venue from 8pm – 4am, so expect not only a bill of fantastic live bands, but an after party of DJs that includes rising electronic artist **Duologue **plus more names to be announced.

Our full line up, and other necessary information, can be found below. We’re also NYC newbies, so if anyone wants to take us for a beer, then we’d be more than happy to oblige.

A huge thank you to the irresistible [Feel Good Lost](http://www.feelgoodlost.me/) who so lovingly, and brilliantly, designed the poster for our showcase.

Register your interest on our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/events/291239217684187) and [Eventbrite](http://darkparadisecmj.eventbrite.com/) pages and to keep up to date on any developments.

See you Stateside!
